description: Redesigned app layout including toolbar and left navigation look and feel and updated app content to scroll
Redesigned Link Library with better formatting and design, including link icons and animations
Added new Steam Insight tool for users to search through Steam's catalogue and view information related to that Game and its DLC
Added new Text Analysis tool to display breakdowns of character and words, as well as readablity statistics
Added new Base Conversion tool for users to easily convert between number bases.
Production release made available. Deployment configurations set in project source.
Updated app administration to control Link Library links and implemented new Admin Dashboard.
Updated users authentication to allow for logount and automatic token refresh.
Added account creation and login for admin users to maintain the application.
Left Navigation added to allow navigation between libraries and tools of the application.
Link Library feature available for users. Users can now filter a page of useful links to external websites and software.
